Z3: YEScoder feature detection

Vincent J. Carey, stvjc at channing.harvard.edu

August 01, 2023

Source: vignettes/Z3_detection.Rmd
Z3_detection.Rmd

The concept of an image feature 

library(YEScoder)
library(littleDeep)
data(ciftrain1k)
plotOne(ciftrain1k[4])

What are the most prominent features?

Automated edge detection 

sob1 = runSobel(ciftrain1k[4])
## Loading required namespace: EBImageExtra
sob1
## ImageArray instance with 1 images, each 32 x 32 x 3
##  Image types: orange 
##  Array elements range from 0.000000 to 2.443000.
plotOne(sob1, transpose=TRUE, interpolate=FALSE)

What is an edge? How many edges have been found?

What kind of analysis of the numerical data underlying the image would be needed to count the edges?
